title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: July 20, 2022, 10:55:01 PMLast edit: February 17, 2025, 04:07:23 PM by ZipReg
content: This is the OFFICIAL CONTEST Thread for CoolStorage.org's#001 Canvas Crypto Puzzle Contest - "The Times Traveler" Â The World's first LOADED Conceptual Art CanvasA hoard of loaded canvases with a design based on a sci-fi concept that alters the iconicJanuary 3rd, 2009 THE TIMES front page layout. Disguised as a conceptual art project, theLimited Edition pieces of The Times Traveler contain an intricate crypto puzzle which hasbeen carefully embedded into their design. Whomever is skilled enough to find the secretsand successfully unlocks the key, claims all of the BTC locked away in the canvases! Thewinner earns the BTC and bragging rights, and every contestant own's a 100+ yearfade resistant conceptual art canvas with a very unique history attached.In actuality, each Limited Edition piece is in fact a "one off" that has been printed from it'sown unique source. You only need one Limited Edition piece to unlock the key of The TimesTraveler, however, having a prototype or proof may help! The best part about our cryptopuzzle contest is that you do not need to destroy any of the pieces to unlock the secrets ofThe Times Traveler, it is hidden in plain sight!CoolStorage.org Presents..."The Times Traveler" Limited Edition16x20 Gallery Wrapped LOADED Canvas Crypto PuzzleWho will discover the secrets and unlock the key to The Times Traveler? Â Only TIME will tell! Â CONTEST RULES:No up close images of the canvas posted on the internet.This could compromise the integrity of the contest.If one of the contest pieces is re-sold it must be made known in this threadby the seller confirming the new owner to be added as a replacement contestant.CONSULTATION:If you think you've discovered a secret but want confirmation, please usethe CoolStorage.org EMSG App.  Â PM your EMSG linkto consult with me, and I will confirm and/or deny what you've found.ONE CLUE:There will be one CLUE posted here in the form of a riddle. Â THREE WISHES:The contestants shall have a total of THREE WISHES to use at any time during the competition.Contestants should discuss any ideas for wish requests to agree upon in this thread.Once a WISH is discussed it can then be VOTED on by contestants.There will be a (1) week voting period for contestants to submit their vote here,otherwise the vote is fore-fitted and we tally the total votes submitted by contestants.Certain wishes will not be allowed, like a wish for more wishes, for example.WISH EXAMPLES:I had intended on keeping the public address of the canvases a secret, andallow whomever solves the puzzle to reveal the grand prize, however,if the contestants were to vote on a wish revealing that and the votepassed, the public address of the canvases would be posted in thread.Perhaps you are all stumped and need an additional CLUE, make a WISH. Â Maybe you all VOTE to ask a technical question about the puzzle?How many secrets in total? Are there areas of the canvas we should ignore?Maybe you decide to VOTE for help from all collectible community members This could mean the contest winner ends up not be an original contestant,but if it is your WISH and the VOTE passes, it is done.THE CONTESTANTS:Icedminerjonesminerjonesgarciaor2002ragilabXYZoMrCryptHodlEst2013pinky1234DernosteGeoMoparMiningLLCHookzup1Hookzup1raghavsoodThank you for your support everyone! Congratulation's to you onowning the very first loaded conceptual art canvases ever created!They will remain loaded canvases until the puzzle is solvedand then they will be once loaded canvases! Â BONUS ROUNDS:WELCOME BONUS ROUND:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410154.0More fun surprises unveiled in the future! FUN FACTS:Some of the canvases have time machines featuring theHODL graphic from BTC To The Future v1.0 on their front fenders. Â The canvases were loaded with the Grand Prize via three transactions.They were first loaded on Independence Day. July 4th, 2022.The second was sent on Nicola Tesla's Birthday. July 10th, 2022.The third and final transaction was sent on August 2nd, 2022,the Anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence.

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.created_time: July 20, 2022, 10:55:21 PMLast edit: September 02, 2022, 10:18:43 PM by ZipReg
comments.body: THE CLUE:Go back! A wise man acknowledges he knows nothing, rising each day,focused on filling his cup with more knowledge. A 180 from the depths of mediocrity,striving to reach each new level. Searching from all angles, searching high and low,searching to solve the Times Traveler, it is the opposite way, you must go...

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: CONTEST LAUNCH DATE: September 2nd, 2022CLARIFICATION:THE SECRETS YOU SEEK ARE PART OF A PRIVATE KEY THATHAS BEEN EMBEDDED INTO EACH CANVAS, IN PLAIN SIGHTTHE SMALL ARTICLE TEXT IS BLURRED INTENTIONALLYTHERE ARE NO SECRETS HIDDEN IN THE ARTICLE TEXTBONUS ROUND:THE FIRST CONTESTANT TO REPLY TO THIS THREAD WITHWHAT HISTORIC EVENT TOOK PLACE ON THIS DATE WINS A PRIZE! Thank You & Good Luck on your Quest to Decodethe Secrets and Discover the Key to The Times Traveler!LET THE FUN BEGIN!

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: My best guess for historic event on September 2 is VJ day, Victory in Japan day WW2, when Japan surrendered to the US after US dropped 2 atomic bombs in August. Â Geo

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: geophphreigh on September 03, 2022, 02:56:21 PMMy best guess for historic event on September 2 is VJ day, Victory in Japan day WW2, when Japan surrendered to the US after US dropped 2 atomic bombs in August. Â GeoHey Geo  that is a great guess buddy! Unfortunately it is not the correct answer for this bonus round!Please feel free to guess again! Thanks

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: My bonus guess: Semptember 2 (1789) is the date that The United States Department of the Treasury is founded.

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: Iced on September 03, 2022, 03:24:19 PMMy bonus guess: Semptember 2 (1789) is the date that The United States Department of the Treasury is founded.BONUS ROUND**WINNER!!**IcedCongratulations! You have won a pizza day box set!!That is the correct answer for this bonus round! Congrats buddyÂ   will reach out shortlySeptember 2, 1789 - The Department of the U.S. Treasury was established by Congress.Money printer go BRRR!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: CONTEST UPDATE** WEEK ONE **Well, it's official guys! ONE WEEK has passed since launch...AND THE BTCTC GRAND PRIZE REMAINS UP FOR GRABS!! Just a reminder to contestants! Althoughyou are competing against one another, you still have to worktogether to use a wish! Contestants may discuss andvote to use a wish at any point during the contest.THANK YOU & GOOD LUCK EVERYONE!!

Alright back to examination table ðŸ˜‰Right on buddyÂ   the OP has a section on the 3 wishes and some examples, but let me clarify this for everyone just in case. You are all competing against one another to solve the puzzle and win the grand prize, however, contestants will need to work together to use a wish.Discuss what questions to use a wish on, then vote on what question to ask, and after one week the votes are tallied and the question with the most votes is answered.If there are any other questions about this, please do not hesitate to ask, thanks everyone!Â   Quote from: Dernoste on September 10, 2022, 05:00:07 PMso we scratch?Hey buddyÂ   I was just having a little fun showing off our bonus round scratch off game. Pretty cool huhÂ   We're not at that bonus round yet, but we will definitely play one or more scratch off bonus rounds for some fun in the near future! Thank you, Sir!

But we can hold a raffle later so contestants may have a chance to WIN a used one!Â  You know, I've been pitching this contests as a way for people to have some fun with a new concept, try to solve the puzzle, and escape all the negative BS going on these days for a bit, but I'm starting to realize I may have actually made this contest for ME to escape all the BS going on these days and have some fun LMAO! This is great, thank you all once again "SO WE SCRATCH?"
